title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes the Baker Mayfield trade landing him with the Carolina Panthers and what we can expect from the former number 1 overall pick and Heisman Trophy winner. He wants Kevin Durant to escape the Brooklyn Nets so we can see him on a great team like the Suns or the Heat. He believes this NBA star player is not a "grinder" despite recent reports about his offseason workouts. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Eric Mangini joins the show to give his thoughts on Mayfield in Carolina and what's next for Jimmy Garoppolo. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
